name: TidyCmd v1.4
summary: Windows Command Line front-end to HTML Tidy library
short_description:
TidyCmd is a front-end to access the C# HTML Tidy library by Seth Yates which is part of his AtomSite program 
* https://code.google.com/p/atomsite/

TidyCmd home webpage
* http://home.comcast.net/~lang.dennis/cs-tidycmd/tidycmd.html
Other good references:
* http://sourceforge.net/projects/tidy/
* http://www.w3.org/People/Raggett/tidy/

In addition to basic HTML syntax validation and HTML reformatting (beautify) I added Style parsing, Image and Href load verification and ability to walk and parse an entire web-site both as local file or directly on the Web. 

TidyCmd is limited to HTML4.0 but will perform the basic HTML validation and full IMGage and HREF verification. 

Program written in C# using .net 3.5

Limitiations - 
* Does not parse or beautify Script elements. 
  Script section is output "as is" with no reformatting.
* Does not have any special verification of HTML5 syntax

Latest version v1.4  29-Dec-2014
